RENTAL HOUSE ADDRESS: Komune Living Thinker Studio (1 Super Single Bed)
REMARK:
Room Features: Free WiFi, 42”LED TV with IPTV, In-room safe, Mini Fridge
Room Amenities: Air-condition, Bidet, Hairdryer, *Smoke Detectors (No Smoking!)*

Komune Living Benefits & Privileges
• Wireless internet broadband access.
• Full access to co-living facilities located at Level 1 and Level 29 (co-living space, community 
kitchen, launderette, games base, level 1 alfresco area, infinity pool and gymnasium). 
• Bathroom amenity - 2 in 1 shower gel will be provided. 
• Monthly stay - Housekeeping services will be *One (1) time cleaning and changing of linen & towels in a week.*

Remarks:
1. Rates are subject to change without prior notice. 
2. Prevailing daily rate will only apply for Extension Stay of less than One (1) month.
3. Breakfast is chargeable at RM450.00+ per month per person.
4. Rates are subjected to 6% Service Tax and Tourism Tax (RM10 per night)
